project.name: fb-scrap
project.description: Algorithm to scrap a FB page

Facebook API.name: Facebook API
Facebook API.description: Module to work with the Facebook Graph API.

FacebookApiFactory.name: FacebookApiFactory
FacebookApiFactory.description:
Factory for the FacebookApi class.

Puts in default values for options.api_root and 
options.api_version.

params.name: options
params.description:
The options for the newly
 instantiated {{#crossLink "FacebookApi"}}{{/crossLink}} object.

FacebookApi.name: FacebookApi
FacebookApi.description: Class that handles the communiction with the FB Graph API.

params.name: access_token
params.description: The new access token to set

return.description: Returns `this` so that methods could be chained.

classitems.description: Changes the api version string. Default is v2.7.
classitems.name: setVersion

return.description: Returns `this` so that methods could be chained.

params.name: url
params.description: The Graph API endpoint. I.e. "me/posts" or "12345_2342341"

params.name: params
params.description: Aditional GET parameters for the Graph API calls.

params.name: cb
params.description: The callback when the method has completed

return.description: Returns `this` so that methods could be chained.
